description: A stylesheet that defines CSS variables for theme management and styles for the App component, including light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the App component, defining background color, text color, and layout.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the App, including alignment and background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo in the App, including animation properties.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including position, background color, text style, and hover effects.
